title: Doombots Teemoing Icon
body: For the Doom Bots icon, does anyone know if you can earn it in the Teemoing queue? or do you need to be running Gauntlet?

replies.body:
You should earn it for any *Doom Bots* mode *up to a week* after beating the match.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hey I know this post is old but if I could get this cleared up that would be fantastic.
I played and won a The Teemoing match and also gifted a skin to a friend the day the event started but I have not received any of my icons but other friends have. When should I get my icons? Or should I have already gotten them?
We're sending the icons out until November 17th, so if you don't have anything after that day rolls by, please let me know.
Thank you for the reply, will do!
